website_summaries.verdict: Faster charging for USB devices via its ports than more popular outlet brands. Installation is smooth, though a few users report issues with the outlet after powering the circuit.
pros: Higher amperage enables faster device charging through USB ports
Customer service can help walk through installation issues
cons: Some reports of USB ports failing after a few months
Always-on LED indicator continuously draws power
Use caution when loosening terminal screws because they arrive already backed out

customer_reviews.title: Compact enough to fit in gangbox
customer_reviews.text: Installed 4 units with no real problems. I was concerned about them being too thick(expected) but there was adequate room for wires to be pushed behind outlet in gangbox. love the green LED indicator showing power. Love the high output USB. My only small issues were due to the poor cardboard packaging of each unit, some were missing extra plates or parts that I fortunately was able to take from the others that were complete. Also, the first time to plug in to the lower 120v AC outlet is very hard. After getting it in the first time all is well. Apparently internal flexing was needed. Good value for the price and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C.

customer_reviews.title: 2 devices and 2 outlets... perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome... went it super easy, and easily charges 2 iPads at the same time, and quickly at that. no issues with device overheating or anything (which incidentally is usually caused by the device itself not being able to adapt to or regulate the electricity flow that it is receiving). I love this because it helps clean up the look of the kitchen counter and i can charge 2 devices without having the charging adapters handing out and i STILL get the function of the two outlets... perfect
customer_reviews.author: KawaiiGuyy

customer_reviews.title: Works but far from flawless
customer_reviews.text: This product works but I have a few issues with it. First, the tamper proof design makes it very difficult to plug something in the outlet. Second, the outlet is bulky and just fits in a standard single gang box.. Third, as other reviewers have noted, there’s no stop on the terminal screws, so be really careful if you have to unscrew a terminal or you’ll render the outlet worthless..
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth P. Mostello

customer_reviews.title: thumbs down....
customer_reviews.text: USB charger stopped working after 6 months. With that and the lack of UL listing, the thing is going out. Manufacturer Warranty? Feb 2017 Update: received a replacement from Topele and seems to be working fine now. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Some User

customer_reviews.title: Great standard receptacle with usb charging and very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: In today world, usb charging needed for every household. My old style receptacle has been stop working so I have decide to give it a upgrade with a usb charging. I have search amazon and this topele ld-ur01 came up which i needed for my upgrade. It fits any standard electrical outlet just as any other outlet and it works great. Also, it charges faster than the USB adaptor from apple becuase it has 2.1A per usb output. I love it offers 2 USB ports AND keeps the regular receptacles. I def recommend this product and give it a two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: LouisF

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: so far i have installed 5 of the ones I purchased! They are easy to install thought I had an issue with the side screws if you unscrew it too far ...ti's hard to get it back in place to use because the contact plate on the inside of the outlets gets loose and is a pain to line it back up in place. other than that takes about 5 mins to do each one! Perfect for places where you entertain and have friends always asking to charge their phone .... kitchen ... by night stands, etc ...and charges the phone quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Don't use your phone on this one.
customer_reviews.text: Hello and good day. I ordered this about 5 months ago. I have had an issue with it from day one. When I have a cell phone plugged into the USB to charge there is a HIGH level of electronic noise. To the point, it interferes with using the phones touch screen. Rendering it almost useless. How do I go about getting a replacement for this? Mark Gordon
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Poor USB ports
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of adding USB outlets, but this device does not put out good power on the USB ports. I plugged in a speaker powered bu USB and the speaker makes noise. When I plug in the speaker to a USB adapter the speaker does not have the noise.
customer_reviews.author: savemoney

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is as easy to install as a regular outlet. You won't need a deeper box for extra wires as the wiring for the USB is internal. The only problem is my wife now thinks she needs more of them. I guess at this price I should just keep her happy and order a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed in my Travel Trailer
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace a factory installed outlet in my travel trailer. It cleaned up a bit of a spider web by getting rid of a 110 volt adapter I was using to charge my phone. So long as this keeps working as well as it is, I will be purchasing another in my outdoor kitchen to charge phones while sitting outside. So far a great value for the dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Ductape

customer_reviews.title: Don’t back out the hot or neutral screws.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how it works because I backed the hot screw out just a little too far and the nut came off. Great design on a $20 outlet. I’m sure it works well, but I guess I won’t be finding out since Topele uses triangular screws to hold the back case on.
customer_reviews.author: Sean S.

customer_reviews.title: Dreaded screw problem
customer_reviews.text: I too fell victim to the dreaded screw issue. I barely started to back it out and, whoosh on to the floor. I now have a useless piece of electrical. I do not understand why this was made without some type of retention mechanism for the contact plates. Horribly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Zeb

customer_reviews.title: Less fighting = happy mom
customer_reviews.text: We always have more cords than blocks (i mean seriously, do they eat them??) I have one in each of the kids' rooms and one in the living room. Now there's no blocks to lose and devices are actually getting charged. I'll probably get a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Meranath

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: The Topele USB outlet was easy to install and works great. I bought two of these for my children's rooms after first purchasing a Topgreener USB for my bathroom. Unlike the Topgreener these have a small green light that indicates they are working. Unlike others I don't feel the light is too bright. In my opinion the quality of the Topele USB outlets are on par with the more expensive Topgreener. And possibly made in the same Chinese factory. There is a UL label on the units I received.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: What do you think if you keep getting the used one?
customer_reviews.text: Received the return/used one with missing screws. This is the replacement after the 1st one more worst than this: another used one as well. 3 stars are for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: BV-Anaheim

customer_reviews.title: This is a great idea!  Hopefully the USB connection will remain a standard as long as a 3 prong plug!
customer_reviews.text: Are you getting tired of looking around for the charger? Or is it being used by someone else? Here's the answer!! Easy to install, it never gets lost or borrowed.... always there waiting patiently for your batteries to run down. It works well and provides a 2 amp charge which charges iPhone and iPads alike.
customer_reviews.author: Don's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great Plug, fast charging of tablets and phones
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this plug that I ordered a 2nd one and may order more. If you are looking, don't worry it is a great plug at a great price. This plug is a quality receptacle and installation was easy. The USB port is reliable and very fast for charging both tablets and phones.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Output on USB Appears to be as Stated
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to deal with cord and charger clutter at the kitchen counter. Amazon price is a fraction of hardware or big box stores. The charging amp output matches that of the higher output rated wall chargers including the factory Samsung ones we have. I will likelly buy some more for other locations in the house and our lake house. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. This thing was a snap to install and is perhaps one of the most valuable little upgrades I've made to my apartment. Comes with a standard cover plate with screw holes, as well as the blank face as shown in the product photo. Includes a charging light to assure you that your device is being fed. Almost literally plug-and-play, I'm not sure why this isn't standard in every residence nowadays.
customer_reviews.author: That guy

customer_reviews.title: Works as they should.
customer_reviews.text: Have these installed in my house as a quick upgrade to certain areas and they work fantastic. Works as intended and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S. Pross

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few years.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 5 of these 3 years ago. Worked great for a few years. Today 2 still work. Worth noting the AC outlets still work. The DC outlets do go out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B. Herndon

customer_reviews.title: I'd put them in everywhere if I had the money.
customer_reviews.text: They are pricey but worth every penny since you don't need to go looking for a charger anymore. I like how they come with two different wall plates and an led light to help see in the dark. Not to mention the charge rate is higher than most cheap chargers that come with your cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have this
customer_reviews.text: This item was packaged very well. The item came at the time that it said it would arrive. I actually did this as a DIY project. I felt that with the technology now this was a must have in my home. This item is very easy to install and you just have to make sure that you turn off the power to that room that you're putting this in.
customer_reviews.author: Quincy

customer_reviews.title: I do like the look of the outlet though
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for the quick charging aspect. Oddly the amps are more than my droid stock charger but it these outlets will not quick charge a galaxy 7 phone. Bummer. I do like the look of the outlet though, and you can charge while still using the plugs, assuming no huge wall wart.
customer_reviews.author: nel99

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: This plug was easily installed for this unhandy man. The USB charging ports are a great addition to the plug on our countertop.
customer_reviews.author: The Guy from Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Won't eat up all the outlets!
customer_reviews.text: Putting 2 of these side by side in a double box above kitchen counter. Will then have enough usb connectors for all our charging needs! Won't eat up all the outlets either with block chargers hogging all the outlets! Have to get my own cover plate from the local hardware store but that's not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: ND Roughrider

customer_reviews.title: Works But...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install except only has 2 push in wire connectors on each side so if You have more then 2 hot an com. wires you will have to use wire nuts and splice. Screws cannot be used.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Gawron

customer_reviews.title: Wall Outlet USB Replacement
customer_reviews.text: As more and more electronics become usb dependent having a few of these around the house instead of a bunch of plug in chargers will be a nice feature. They are a little pricey at the moment but as the demand for them becomes more realized they will get cheaper. Will definitely buy more either way.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife, happy life
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of hearing my wife complain about the power strip next to her side of the bed for the million things that she needs to plug in every night so I got this so she could plug all of her stuff in to the wall. She loves having the USB plugs built into the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: David Hull

customer_reviews.title: I have an older house, the housing of this ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an older house, the housing of this box would not fit. We tried to jam the box in the wall box, but it just wouldn't go. Maybe when you start with a next box/from scratch it works.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie R

customer_reviews.title: Size does matter.
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit thick. If you have other wires in the box, it makes it hard to get it in there.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works well but....
customer_reviews.text: This receptacle seems to be well built and works as described. The USB outputs charge all my devices. My one complaint is that the tamper proof system that protects the Edison AC outputs is way too difficult to get past when simply inserting a power plug. I have many other receptacles in my house with this safety feature but you don't need to literally force the AC plug into them.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Not durable USB ports failed
customer_reviews.text: Stopped charging from USB ports after a few months of minimal use
customer_reviews.author: John Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: This works really well, charges everything I plug into it - from my Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge, to my Samsung Gear S2 Classic. Even had my friend's new iPad plugged in and it charged right up. Works just like it should. I just wish it was QC compliant!
customer_reviews.author: CL4P-TP

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality after a few months
customer_reviews.text: These were great for the first 6 months. I started to notice that my phones weren't charging when plugged into the USB portion. At first I thought it was my cords, but then I plugged the cords into the regular 110 volt plug and all my cords worked, so the USB portion of these outlets are faulty. Guess I should have stuck with my local hardware store and paid a few bucks more :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly
customer_reviews.text: Not a fast charger, unit says "you are plugged into a slow charger"
customer_reviews.author: Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Crap. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Junk bought two of these. After a few months they both smelled hot and quit working. Replace them with regular outlets
customer_reviews.author: William Lesh

customer_reviews.title: Installed easily and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: if you are not comfortable with installing an electrical outlet, you should have an electrician put this in for you. That said, it fits well in the electrical box and charges my devices nicely while reducing the number of wall-warts in my outlets.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: The Best 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Thus is the best.. easy to install any works great.. plugs slide in & out easy and USB charges fast.. I have installed in my home over 3 years now and still working great.. now installing on my son’s home and he will love 💕 it... great product 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Beach Club Lifesaver!!!
customer_reviews.text: This USB outlet has blown away our expectations. We have a cabana at the beach and we were constantly fighting over the outlet for charging space, but with this outlet the fight is over. To boot, it charges extremely quick. The instructions are easy to follow and this outlet is easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to power my Firestick - Works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: DJones

customer_reviews.title: Good for plugging 1 or 2  plugs
customer_reviews.text: Seams flimsy hard to plug things in as you have to put hard,if you have to plug in a large plug it will take up other plug in spaces
customer_reviews.author: hendo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, I bought three more.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very easy to install. It took less than 3 minutes from start to finish. Seems to work as it should. I like the 2 faceplate options that come with the outlet. The screw-less faceplate looks very clean when fitted.
customer_reviews.author: Alastair Bramall-Watson

customer_reviews.title: Good addition
customer_reviews.text: Installs like any other outlet. Gave it only 4 stars as it is slow charging via the USB.
customer_reviews.author: Michel Bachand

customer_reviews.title: The USB ports charge tablets with ease unlike other products ...
customer_reviews.text: The USB ports charge tablets with ease unlike other products I have used in the past. I will be replacing all of my older USB - AC outlets with these. Wish there were other colors to select from.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality. However
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. However, just a heads up that this does not "quick charge" the Galaxy s8. Regardless it is a nice product and will be perfect for plugging in devices over night to charge
customer_reviews.author: Josh Brewer

customer_reviews.title: USB power anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to add this to my RV as I needed a couple of USB power ports and didn't want the large power blocks hanging off of the socket, ready to fall out at the first big bump in the road. This powers my GPS and tablet for navigation and finding camping spots while on the road, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Pointless
customer_reviews.text: The true feature here is the USB connectivity. I have both an Android and iPhone. When plugged into the USB ports they get a connection, but the connection is so weak that it doesn't charge either device. Basically, this will keep your device(s) running. What's the point in that?
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Wishy

customer_reviews.title: Great for charging your phone.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and I love that I don't have to hunt for a part to charge my phone (iphone). It is also good for charging things that use a USB port. The little light can be bright in a dark room.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: High quality and good value
customer_reviews.text: These are very high-quality products. I Purchased two in there working well. I’ve had them for over a month.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. Pollock

customer_reviews.title: AVOID this unit. Only "Quick" for a couple months.
customer_reviews.text: When I installed it 3 months ago, the "quick charge" worked fine on the phones we own. Today, there is nothing "quick" about it. It still charges, but NOT at the "quick" speed. I will be removing it and replacing with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Musher

customer_reviews.title: This is a home run product.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. I have placed these in every room and they are used constantly. Great quality and packaging with on-time delivery. Get yours befor they run out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R.  Anderson

customer_reviews.title: USB ports stopped working in less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchase a different brand of outlet with USB ports and it worked great, so this one was a good price and I thought I would try it. The USB ports stopped working within 2 months of the purchase. Not a good deal if it only lasts a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: T Towns

customer_reviews.title: Out works, but wall plate does not.
customer_reviews.text: The item works fine. However, the press on wall plate would not attach to the outlet. There was no way to get it to adhere without gluing it on, so I had to use the screw wall plate. It was unfortunate because the press on would definitely look a little more seamless. Also, the painted screws for the wall plate chip very easily.
customer_reviews.author: stimpa

customer_reviews.title: Not very expensive. Word of Caution--- KILL the power ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very expensive. Word of Caution--- KILL the power to the original outlet before attempting to disassemble. it took a few seconds before I realized that my lips were tingling! Charged a Kindle in no time.
customer_reviews.author: MapkS

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and has been working fine, no more wall adapters taking up space
customer_reviews.author: Jason L Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not turbo
customer_reviews.text: Glad I got it on a daily deal... My phone doesn't recognize it as a turbo charger, so it's just a typical USB charger I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I had a USB outlet that only had a 1amp charge rate. My sons tablet would sometimes not fully charge over night. This outlet solved that problem!!
customer_reviews.author: ImTheJoker

customer_reviews.title: A very good buy.
customer_reviews.text: A good buy. Priced several other places, this was the best price I could find at the time. Works as advertised. Have been using since 2017 does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Glendon Brown

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend  this product to my friends
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, charges my tablet and cell phone at the same time. Mine is located in my kitchen next to a light switch, and the green power light helps to locate the light switch in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: no.1roofer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for charging phones
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, works great. Wife loves it. She likes not looking for a square Everytime the kids have been charging something that day. The child proof socket is a bit hard to plug things into but it's not bad
customer_reviews.author: Gbrownell

customer_reviews.title: USB
customer_reviews.text: The highest amperage my phone charges at using the USB port is 1260ma. I take the same cable and plug it into a standard charging brick and I can obtain more than 2amps.
customer_reviews.author: Tone

customer_reviews.title: Good product though
customer_reviews.text: The only reason i'm giving it 4 stars is because its almost impossible to have things plugged in and a USB connected. Some work . most wont. Good product though.
customer_reviews.author: ls @allstar

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Works really good, I own another brand USB wall charger and it went out in less than a year. This is a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Very handy to have, less clutter with charging units ...
customer_reviews.text: Very handy to have, less clutter with charging units. Plug in the cord and the counter doesn't look so cluttered. You don't need serious electrical know how to install it. The wire colors are on the back of the unit. Could be cheaper with today's technology.
customer_reviews.author: jim tellier

customer_reviews.title: Poorly engineered. This could have been done so easily
customer_reviews.text: Outlet has one set of hot & neutral screws so you cannot easily replace an outlet in the middle of a string. The screw terminals are loose on the inside so if you accidentally loosen a terminal too much, the nut inside will come loose inside the unit.
customer_reviews.author: filmgirl

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price. Saying that you can buy a UK equivalent for half the cost and the UK sockets, power and plugs prefer better. Whilst in the US, these are as good as you'll get.
customer_reviews.author: mark carter

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install, I have an older house and these are a little more bulky than the original outlets so it makes for a tight squeeze but they did end up fitting and work amazing, very convenient to have the USB outlets to plug in phones or other electronics and still use the outlet for other devices that only use the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Koerner

customer_reviews.title: 1-star because mine is broken out of the box. ...
customer_reviews.text: 1-star because mine is broken out of the box. The screw felt off and can't put it back in. There's nothing to hold the wire in place again. Can't open the outlet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Usb portion only worked about one week and now won't charge any more.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: USB charging ports DO NOT work!
customer_reviews.text: USB chargers stopped working within a month after I installed this outlet. Now it is just a normal outlet when I needed a USB charger outlet in this room.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bedeaux

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately these outlets are pretty large. It didnt quite fit into the box ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these outlets are pretty large. It didnt quite fit into the box i was trying to use. I had to squash the effort and use something else. Its similiar to the size of a GFC outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: First unit was not fully functional, but after contact I was sent a replacement unit right away.
customer_reviews.author: California Studios

customer_reviews.title: Recessed wire pocket and screw make it a little annoying to install as well
customer_reviews.text: A little bulky for the single junction box. Recessed wire pocket and screw make it a little annoying to install as well, but I have purchased 3 brands of these and they've all been the same in that regard. This one came with two face plates, one with rounded edges and the other is more modern and square. It works and looks great as advertised. It has a green light indicating it has power.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: USB ports stopped working in about a month
customer_reviews.text: I loved this at first, but the USB ports stopped working after one month. The AC plugs still work, But that’s what I had in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Works well but couldn't get it flush
customer_reviews.text: Product works well. Maybe it was us, but we couldn't get them to go flush against the wall. Hence the 3 stars instead of 4 or 5.
customer_reviews.author: Robert the Alpaca

customer_reviews.title: Works great, attractive.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and adds 2 USB charging ports to a standard outlet so you don't have to use a 'wall wart'
customer_reviews.author: Taka

customer_reviews.title: Fast charge
customer_reviews.text: Love having this where we charge our phones it allows us to charge quickly without tying up a socket and a cinch to install
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: . A bit deep for the box. Cut off back of box and it fit just fine. I will be buying another one soon. Charges phones very fast.
customer_reviews.author: D. Beacco

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm regularly getting <200 milliamps of charge when I should be getting 5x to 10x that, plus the outlet puts off so much interference that I can't use my phone while it's charging. Random spots on the touchscreen register touches, making it impossible to type or browse or use any apps.
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: They work great and have extremely low standby power requirements (less than .5 watts- important when camping with out hookups) We have them installed all through our RV.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate.  Buy this
customer_reviews.text: Works great and looks great. Easy install. What else could you ask for :)
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy w the quick charge on the USB ports!! Charges my phones faster than the Q3 plug in USB chargers!!
customer_reviews.author: M.A. Mazur

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought.
customer_reviews.text: This product claims to be high speed. I have a Galaxy6, and it DOSE NOT CHARGE HIGH SPEED. It is very easy to install that is the only pluss.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Brodeur

customer_reviews.title: USB outlets rule.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid implementation of the design. Note this model has a green light that is always on if power is live...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product. When I went to install this product the screw had come loose on the common side of the plug. There was no way to put it together and use this product. I went to a box store and paid more for something that actually worked.
customer_reviews.author: joan

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Hubby put two in our motorhome and they work wonderfully. Everything charges well.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Seng

customer_reviews.title: Install notes and capabilities.
customer_reviews.text: If you are electrically inclined install is straight forward. A green led indicates the unit is powered. You can plug in a MacBook charging block and an iPhone charging block at the same time. OR use the USB cables with traditional AC plugs. But you cannot use the usb, and two transformers.
customer_reviews.author: Kari S.

customer_reviews.title: Super simple to install, Quality is amazing and solid.
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to install, Quality is amazing and solid. Will be purchasing more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Adapter free for LG V20 and Note 5
customer_reviews.text: We love these outlets. We now have four and no more adapters are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Negrete

customer_reviews.title: These work great. The LED isn't bright at all
customer_reviews.text: These work great. The LED isn't bright at all. To put it in perspective it isn't bright enough to see the plug in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Installed easily and works well
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described and on time. Installed easily and works well. I wish it came in a cream /ivory color.... only white available. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Reefer

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Placed 4 of these around the house for convenient phone charging and they work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bob 256

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These arrived on time and will work great for what I need. Seem to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These things are great, no more finding an adaptor plug and no mor taking up an electrical outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine K. Nordberg

customer_reviews.title: a great addition to my room
customer_reviews.text: Plugging USB cable in first time is not as smooth as it should be. After jostling with it a few seconds though, goes in snugly. Other than that, a great addition to my room.
customer_reviews.author: KENFR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great if you need usb plugs and regular plugs. Has eliminated the need for a power strip.
customer_reviews.author: Aman6

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold
customer_reviews.text: Wires up properly. Usb ports stopped working after a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: OCD Critic

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be constructed well. My only complaint it that the AC outlet portion has childproof plastic inserts that make it very difficult to insert a plug.
customer_reviews.author: frank scandinaro

customer_reviews.title: Love not having a charger plugged in
customer_reviews.text: Love not having a charger plugged in. Works almost as fast as my quick charger. Going to install more.
customer_reviews.author: Dicktopia

product_meta.title: TOPELE High Speed USB Charger Outlet, 4.2a USB Wall Charger with 15A Tamper-Resistant Duplex Receptacle, Child Proof Safety, Wall Plates Included, UL Listed, White
feature_bullets: USB Charger Outlet with 2 USB Ports: --- You can charge the usb devices without adapters, and the outlets apply to normal electrical applications, it is convenient to use the usb ports and outlets simultaneously. Smart-Intelligent automatic identify the charging current that the usb wall outlet required
Tamper-Resistant Design: --- 15A TR Receptacle increases safety level by preventing unwanted objects into the USB outlet, the USB wall outlet will work when two-prong plug are both inserted

Fast Charging and Easy Installation: --- 4.2A 5V DC for 2 USB port provides the fastest charging to iPhones, iPad, iPad mini, kindle, Samsung Galaxy/Note, other cells and USB devices. USB wall outlet is available for 100-120 Volt 50/60 Hz., not require additional wiring, easy to install

Wide range of places: --- In addition to kitchen, bedroom,bathroom, the usb outlet charger is great for commercial places, such as airports, libraries, restaurants, offices and so on. The LD-UR01 4.2A Smart Fast Charger USB Wall Outlet is ideal for any indoor places
2 Years Warranty and UL Listed, 2 Free wallplates, includes a normal wall plate and a screwless wall plate

specifications.Plug Format: B - US style with ground plug.
specifications.Special Features: Charge two USB devices simultaneously without adapters
specifications.Included Components: 1 x USB Outlet, 1 x Standard Wall Plate, 1 x Screwless Wall Plate
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars389 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
